contexts.context: ...many things must be done, and in no <mark>specific</mark> order; the procedure is to perceive and order...
...unathletic, uncoordinated. And yet he yearned. <mark>Specifically</mark>, he yearned for a girl he had known...
"Why don't you explain <mark>specifically</mark> what you'd like us to do?" asked Galsiah calmly...
